#labels libraryreference
=SetID()=

==Description==
This function set a new ID for the servo. After successful setting, the servo ID is updated to NewID. If error occurs, previous ID is used in servo class.

==Include==
G15.h

==Prototype==
word SetID(byte NewID);

==Parameters==
*NewID*: 

==Returns==
Status error. If return is non-zero, error occurred and ID used by servo class remains the same as previous ID.

==Example==
servo1.SetID(5);  //set servo1's ID to 5.

==See Also==
none
